rules.name: Odd route flight level
rules.condition: dep == 'EDDF' and sidwpt in ['TOBAK', 'ANEKI', 'CINDY', 'KOMIB', 'SULUS'] and rfl % 2000 == 0

rules.name: Even route flight level
rules.condition: dep == 'EDDF' and sidwpt in ['OBOKA', 'MARUN', 'SOBRA', 'ULKIG'] and rfl % 2000 != 0

rules.name: ANEKI destination
rules.condition: dep == 'EDDF' and sidwpt == 'ANEKI' and (arr == 'EDDM' or arr == 'EDDN')

rules.name: TOBAK route
rules.condition: dep == 'EDDF' and sidwpt == 'TOBAK' and 'TOBAK Z10' in route

rules.name: Non-RNAV SIDs max route flight level
rules.condition: dep == 'EDDF' and sidwpt in ['MTR', 'RID', 'TAU'] and rfl > 9000

rules.name: Non-RNAV SIDs equipment code
rules.condition: dep == 'EDDF' and sidwpt in ['MTR', 'RID', 'TAU'] and rnav
